description: Try our easy to follow Mint Fudge recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mint Fudge Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease and line a 18x28cm shallow pan with baking paper. Place milk, butter, sugar and 1/4 cup water into a medium pan over low heat. Stir until sugar has dissolved. Increase heat to medium and boil gently for about 10 minutes or until mixture reaches soft ball stage and temperature reaches 230Â°C on a sugar thermometer.
Remove from heat and immediately stir in essence, chocolate and marshmallows. Stir with a wooden spoon until melted and smooth. Quickly pour into pan and smooth surface. Refrigerate until set.

Remove from fridge and leave at room temperature for 5 minutes before cutting. Cut into squares or use a heart shaped cutter. To decorate, colour the white chocolate with 12 drops of food colour. Transfer to a small piping bag. Pipe on your love messages.
